unnormalised: Crop insurance, crucial for farmers like Ramu kaka in Bihar! Heard about the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY).
normalised: Crop insurance, crucial for farmers like Ramu kaka in Bihar! Heard about the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (P M F B Y). Hope it actually helps during droughts. Filed my claim on tenth july two thousand and twenty three, still waiting! Rupees five thousand per acre seems low though. The rains were bad this year, especially in U P. Anyone else facing delays? Did the Gram Sevak say fourteenth august two thousand and twenty three was the last date for filing? seventeen hundred hours deadline? Let's share notes, Jai Kisan!

unnormalised: Hope it actually helps during droughts. Filed my claim on 10/07/2023, still waiting! Rs. 5000 per acre seems low though. The rains were bad this year, especially in UP. Anyone else facing delays? Did the Gram Sevak say 14/08/2023 was the last date for filing? 17:00 hrs deadline? Let's share notes, Jai Kisan!
